hero.title: Hello there!
hero.text: I'm a computer science and interaction design student at QUT, based in Brisbane, Australia. I specialise at the intersection between technical complexity and user experience, and love creating powerful, user-first applications.

images.portrait: An image of Isaac leaning forward in front of a white background.
images.threaditor: Threaditor by Isaa Shea - a post editor for Threads by Instagram.
images.valence: Valence by Isaac Shea - An opinionated React component library.
images.realmix: Realmix by Isaac Shea - Shape the sound of your parties by building collaborative playlists in real-time.
images.filedrop: Filedrop by Isaac Shea - Quickly transfer files between any device.
